headline: Best-Performing Leveraged ETFs of Last Week
summary: USAR-linked leveraged ETFs soared last week as rare-earth stocks jumped, while natural gas and gold plays surged amid tariffs and winter shocks.

headline: China’s Stranglehold on Critical Minerals Creates Massive Opportunity in These 5 Stocks
summary: Oil built the 20th century. Rare earths and critical minerals is building the 21st. Every electric vehicle, wind turbine, solar panel, and guided missile depends on materials one country controls. China dominates the majority of rare earth processing and lithium refining. That’s not a supply chain. That’s a geopolitical weapon. The energy transition isn’t optional. ... China’s Stranglehold on Critical Minerals Creates Massive Opportunity in These 5 Stocks
